Docs.summary: 에 추가할 수 있는 리소스의 기본 클래스를 정의합니다.

remarks.format:
## Examples 다음 예제에서는 추가 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> 파생 형식에는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>합니다.
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: 모든 변경 내용을 커밋하고 문서 패키지에 리소스를 플러시합니다.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 설정에 따라 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>와 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, 플러시 작업을 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> 메서드 전체 될 때까지 지연 될 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 닫혀.
## Examples 다음 예제에서는 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> 메서드 (파생된 클래스)에서 리소스를 추가 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>합니다.
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

remarks.format:
